title: #100: What We Know After 100 Shows
description:
Macroaggressions began in March 2020, right when the plandemic started, and has exploded in popularity over the next year due in large part to the guests that have been a part of the show.

So much has changed in just 12 months across the world, and without the help of the guests to fill in the gaps, we would just be left trying to sort out the mess on our own. Thankfully, they came from all over the world to explain what they were experiencing, and we came to understand that much of the insanity that we endure on a daily basis is not limited to the United States.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
